p: Consumed C for with-fire scenarios (FF-WCE, FS-WCE, FF-NCE) is nearly identical during the 20 th c. ( Fig 8C, Table 6). For these scenarios, consumed C triples from the late 20 th c. to the late 21 st c. The pattern of consumed C is similar among these scenarios throughout the 21 st c., but the range of values increases by the end of the 21 st c. For SF-WCE, consumed C is higher than that for FF-WCE over the 20 th c. but lower during the 21 st c. The standard deviation of SF-WCE consumed C is higher than that for FF-WCE during the early and mid 20 th c. but lower during the late 20 th c. and the mid 21 st c. ( Table 6).
